He then entered the hall and said to the monk, "Sir!
'My parents are both dead!'
He asked the crowd to recite the Mahāprajñāpāramitā.
The crowd had barely gathered.
Zelig then tied his bow with a hammer and said.
'Please, public!'
The Baoshu side said.

source_sentence: 大小荷澤雖然放去較危。
translation: "Although it's more dangerous to let go of a large or small heap of water, it's too dangerous to put it back.
It's too quick to put it back.

source_sentence: 要莊嚴二親報地猶未可。
translation: It's still not possible to adorn two relatives with the ground of reward.
That's not the case with Xuefeng.
Today, perhaps there's a reward for forgetting both relatives.'
He also entered the hall and said with a verbal spell.
'My parents are both dead!'
He asked the crowd to play the Dharma drum.
They will dance with their left hand and right hand with the gong.
It'll scare the tiger off the crossroads.
He looked out over the crowd and said.
"Duh!
Get out of the way! Get out of the way!
Don't come to block the path of my ball.
Zongmen xingu xueji, vol. 5
